snippet: After finishing second to Jordyn Wieber, the reigning world all-around champion, so many times, Gabby Douglas won the United States Olympic gymnastic trials.
abstract: Gabby Douglas wins United States Olympic gymnastic trials, finishing slightly ahead of reigning world all-around champion Jordyn Wieber; Douglas and Wieber will be joined on the US Olympic team for the London Games by Aly Raisman, Kyla Ross and McKayla Maroney.
lead_paragraph: After finishing second to Jordyn Wieber, the reigning world all-around champion, so many times, Gabby Douglas won the United States Olympic gymnastic trials.

headline.seo: Douglas Tops Wieber at Trials as Olympic Gymnastics Team Is Named
headline.main: With Presumed No. 2 in Top Spot, U.S. Women’s Gymnastics Team Is Named
headline.print_headline: With Presumed No. 2 in Top Spot, U.S. Women’s Olympic Team Is Named
